text: Jodi kunba manu tai laga bhai ke paap kaam kori thaka dikhe aru etu pora mora nai koile, tai prathana kori bole lage, aru Isor pora taike jibon dibo. Moi eitu khan ke koi ase kun paap kori kene mora to dikha nai. Kunba paap to mora dikhi pai; Moi etu nimite prathana kori bole lage koi kene kowa nai.
